    23â†’def deep_merge(base: Dict, update: Dict) -> Dict:

    38â†’@tool_handler("read_lifecoach_state")
    39â†’async def read_lifecoach_state(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ToolContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    40â†’    """è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€ (v9.0: ä» skills.lifecoach è¯»å–)"""
    41â†’    sections = args.get("sections", ["system", "north_star", "current", "progress"])

    43â†’    try:

    46â†’        content = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_uuid, "lifecoach")

    60â†’        return {

1â†’"""
     2â†’Lifecoach Skill API Services - äººç”Ÿä»ªè¡¨ç›˜ API æœåŠ¡
     3â†’
     4â†’ä½¿ç”¨ @skill_service è£…é¥°å™¨è‡ªåŠ¨æ³¨å†Œåˆ° SkillServiceRegistry
     5â†’é€šè¿‡ /api/v1/skills/lifecoach/{action} è®¿é—®
     6â†’
     7â†’ç«¯ç‚¹:
     8â†’- state_read: è¯»å–äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€
     9â†’- checkin: æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°
    10â†’- lever_complete: å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†
    11â†’- rock_complete: å®Œæˆå‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´
    12â†’- lever_skip: è·³è¿‡æ¯æ—¥æ æ†
    13â†’- journal_add: æ·»åŠ æ—¥å¿—
    14â†’- journal_list: è·å–æ—¥å¿—åˆ—è¡¨
    15â†’- weekly_review: è·å–å‘¨å¤ç›˜æ•°æ®
    16â†’"""
    17â†’import logging
    18â†’from typing import Dict, Any, List, Optional
    19â†’from datetime import datetime, date, timezone
    20â†’from uuid import UUID
    21â†’
    22â†’from services.agent.skill_service_registry import skill_service, ServiceContext
    23â†’from stores.unified_profile_repo import UnifiedProfileRepository
    24â†’
    25â†’logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    26â†’
    27â†’
    28â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    29â†’# Helper Functions
    30â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    31â†’
    32â†’async def get_lifecoach_data(user_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    33â†’    """
    34â†’    ä» unified_profile è·å– lifecoach æ•°æ®
    35â†’
    36â†’    v9.0: åªä» skills.lifecoach è¯»å–
    37â†’    """
    38â†’    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    39â†’    data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_uuid, "lifecoach")
    40â†’    return data if data else {}
    41â†’
    42â†’
    43â†’async def save_lifecoach_data(user_id: str, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
    44â†’    """
    45â†’    ä¿å­˜ lifecoach æ•°æ®åˆ° unified_profile
    46â†’
    47â†’    v9.0: åªå†™å…¥ skills.lifecoachï¼Œå·²ç§»é™¤ life_context åŒå†™
    48â†’    è‡ªåŠ¨åŒæ­¥åˆ° vibe.target
    49â†’    """
    50â†’    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    51â†’    data["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
    52â†’
    53â†’    # å†™å…¥ skills.lifecoachï¼Œå¹¶åŒæ­¥åˆ° vibe.target
    54â†’    await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_uuid, "lifecoach", data)
    55â†’
    56â†’
    57â†’def transform_to_frontend_format(data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    58â†’    """å°†å­˜å‚¨æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼"""
    59â†’    result = {}
    60â†’
    61â†’    # north_star
    62â†’    if "north_star" in data:
    63â†’        result["north_star"] = data["north_star"]
    64â†’
    65â†’    # goals
    66â†’    if "goals" in data:
    67â†’        goals_data = data["goals"]
    68â†’        if isinstance(goals_data, dict):
    69â†’            result["goals"] = goals_data.get("items", [])
    70â†’        elif isinstance(goals_data, list):
    71â†’            result["goals"] = goals_data
    72â†’
    73â†’    # roles
    74â†’    if "roles" in data or "identity" in data:
    75â†’        identity = data.get("identity", {})
    76â†’        result["roles"] = identity.get("roles", [])
    77â†’
    78â†’    # identity
    79â†’    if "identity" in data:
    80â†’        result["identity"] = data["identity"]
    81â†’
    82â†’    # weekly_rocks -> current.week
    83â†’    current = data.get("current", {})
    84â†’    if "week" in current:
    85â†’        week_data = current["week"]
    86â†’        result["weekly_rocks"] = {
    87â†’            "week_start": week_data.get("week_start", date.today().isoformat()),
    88â†’            "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
    89â†’            "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
    90â†’            "energy_budget": week_data.get("energy_budget"),
    91â†’            "stats": _calculate_rock_stats(week_data.get("rocks", []))
    92â†’        }
    93â†’
    94â†’    # daily_levers -> current.daily
    95â†’    if "daily" in current:
    96â†’        daily_data = current["daily"]
    97â†’        result["daily_levers"] = {
    98â†’            "date": daily_data.get("date", date.today().isoformat()),
    99â†’            "levers": daily_data.get("levers", []),
   100â†’            "energy_level": daily_data.get("energy_level"),
   101â†’            "intention": daily_data.get("intention"),
   102â†’            "stats": _calculate_lever_stats(daily_data.get("levers", []))
   103â†’        }
   104â†’
   105â†’    # monthly_boss -> current.month
   106â†’    if "month" in current:
   107â†’        result["monthly_boss"] = current["month"]
   108â†’
   109â†’    # progress
   110â†’    if "progress" in data:
   111â†’        progress = data["progress"]
   112â†’        today = date.today().isoformat()
   113â†’        result["progress"] = {
   114â†’            "current_streak": progress.get("current_streak", 0),
   115â†’            "longest_streak": progress.get("longest_streak", 0),
   116â†’            "total_checkins": progress.get("total_checkins", 0),
   117â†’            "weekly_completion_rate": _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current),
   118â†’            "monthly_stats": progress.get("monthly_stats"),
   119â†’            "achievements": progress.get("achievements", []),
   120â†’            "last_checkin_date": progress.get("last_checkin_date"),
   121â†’            "today_checked_in": progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today,
   122â†’        }
   123â†’
   124â†’    return result
   125â†’
   126â†’
   127â†’def _calculate_rock_stats(rocks: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   128â†’    """è®¡ç®—å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ç»Ÿè®¡"""
   129â†’    total = len(rocks)
   130â†’    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
   131â†’    in_progress = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "in_progress")
   132â†’    return {
   133â†’        "total": total,
   134â†’        "completed": completed,
   135â†’        "in_progress": in_progress,
   136â†’        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
   137â†’    }
   138â†’
   139â†’
   140â†’def _calculate_lever_stats(levers: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   141â†’    """è®¡ç®—æ¯æ—¥æ æ†ç»Ÿè®¡"""
   142â†’    total = len(levers)
   143â†’    completed = sum(1 for l in levers if l.get("status") == "completed")
   144â†’    return {
   145â†’        "total": total,
   146â†’        "completed": completed,
   147â†’        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
   148â†’    }
   149â†’
   150â†’
   151â†’def _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current: Dict[str, Any]) -> int:
   152â†’    """è®¡ç®—æœ¬å‘¨å®Œæˆç‡"""
   153â†’    week_data = current.get("week", {})
   154â†’    rocks = week_data.get("rocks", [])
   155â†’    if not rocks:
   156â†’        return 0
   157â†’    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
   158â†’    return round(completed / len(rocks) * 100)
   159â†’
   160â†’
   161â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   162â†’# State Read Service
   163â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   164â†’
   165â†’@skill_service("lifecoach", "state_read", description="è¯»å–äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€", auth_required=True)
   166â†’async def read_state(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   167â†’    """
   168â†’    è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€
   169â†’
   170â†’    Args:
   171â†’        sections: è¦è¯»å–çš„æ•°æ®éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¦‚ ["north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"]
   172â†’
   173â†’    Returns:
   174â†’        status: success/empty/error
   175â†’        data: LifecoachSkillData æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®
   176â†’    """
   177â†’    sections = args.get("sections", ["system", "north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"])
   178â†’
   179â†’    if not context.user_id:
   180â†’        return {"status": "error", "message": "Authentication required", "data": {}}
   181â†’
   182â†’    try:
   183â†’        # è·å–å®Œæ•´æ•°æ®
   184â†’        raw_data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
   185â†’
   186â†’        if not raw_data:
   187â†’            return {
   188â†’                "status": "empty",
   189â†’                "message": "å°šæœªå»ºç«‹äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾",
   190â†’                "data": {}
   191â†’            }
   192â†’
   193â†’        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼
   194â†’        result_data: Dict[str, Any] = {}
   195â†’
   196â†’        # north_star
   197â†’        if "north_star" in sections and "north_star" in raw_data:
   198â†’            result_data["north_star"] = raw_data["north_star"]
   199â†’
   200â†’        # identity
   201â†’        if "identity" in sections and "identity" in raw_data:
   202â†’            result_data["identity"] = raw_data["identity"]
   203â†’
   204â†’        # goals
   205â†’        if "goals" in sections and "goals" in raw_data:
   206â†’            result_data["goals"] = raw_data["goals"]
   207â†’
   208â†’        # focus (è‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—)
   209â†’        if "focus" in sections:
   210â†’            if "focus" in raw_data:
   211â†’                result_data["focus"] = raw_data["focus"]
   212â†’            else:
   213â†’                # å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ focus å­—æ®µï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—
   214â†’                result_data["focus"] = _calculate_focus(
   215â†’                    raw_data.get("goals", []),
   216â†’                    raw_data.get("current", {})
   217â†’                )
   218â†’
   219â†’        # weekly (ä» current.week è½¬æ¢)
   220â†’        if "current" in sections:
   221â†’            current = raw_data.get("current", {})
   222â†’            if "week" in current:
   223â†’                week_data = current["week"]
   224â†’                result_data["weekly"] = {
   225â†’                    "week_start": week_data.get("week_start"),
   226â†’                    "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
   227â†’                    "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
   228â†’                }
   229â†’
   230â†’        # progress
   231â†’        if "progress" in sections and "progress" in raw_data:
   232â†’            result_data["progress"] = raw_data["progress"]
   233â†’
   234â†’        # system state
   235â†’        if "system" in sections:
   236â†’            result_data["_state"] = raw_data.get("system", {})
   237â†’
   238â†’        return {
   239â†’            "status": "success",
   240â†’            "data": result_data
   241â†’        }
   242â†’
   243â†’    except Exception as e:
   244â†’        logger.error(f"Read lifecoach state failed: {e}")
   245â†’        return {"status": "error", "message": str(e), "data": {}}
   246â†’
   247â†’
   248â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   249â†’# Checkin Service
   250â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   251â†’
   252â†’@skill_service("lifecoach", "checkin", description="æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°", auth_required=True)
   253â†’async def daily_checkin(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   254â†’    """
   255â†’    æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°
   256â†’
   257â†’    Args:
   258â†’        energy_level: èƒ½é‡ç­‰çº§ (1-10)
   259â†’        intention: ä»Šæ—¥æ„å›¾
   260â†’        mood: å¿ƒæƒ…
   261â†’
   262â†’    Returns:
   263â†’        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
   264â†’        streak: å½“å‰è¿ç»­å¤©æ•°
   265â†’        daily_levers: ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†è¡ŒåŠ¨
   266â†’    """
   267â†’    if not context.user_id:
   268â†’        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}
   269â†’
   270â†’    energy_level = args.get("energy_level")
   271â†’    intention = args.get("intention")
   272â†’    mood = args.get("mood")
   273â†’
   274â†’    try:
   275â†’        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
   276â†’        progress = data.get("progress", {
   277â†’            "current_streak": 0,
   278â†’            "longest_streak": 0,
   279â†’            "total_checkins": 0,
   280â†’            "last_checkin_date": None,
   281â†’            "checkin_history": []
   282â†’        })
   283â†’
   284â†’        today = date.today().isoformat()
   285â†’        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
   286â†’
   287â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä»Šå¤©å·²ç­¾åˆ°
   288â†’        if progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today:
   289â†’            return {
   290â†’                "success": True,
   291â†’                "streak": progress["current_streak"],
   292â†’                "message": "ä»Šå¤©å·²ç»ç­¾åˆ°è¿‡äº†",

```python
# ä¸è¦åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªé—®é¢˜åéƒ½ä¿å­˜ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ç­‰æ‰€æœ‰é—®é¢˜å®Œæˆåç»Ÿä¸€ä¿å­˜
```

```typescript
// 1. ç­¾åˆ°è¿ç»­æ€§è®¡ç®—
function calculateStreak(checkinHistory: CheckinRecord[], today: Date): number {
  if (!checkinHistory || checkinHistory.length === 0) return 0;
  
  const lastCheckin = checkinHistory[0];
  const daysSince = getDaysSince(lastCheckin.date, today);
  
  if (daysSince === 0) return lastCheckin.streak; // ä»Šå¤©å·²ç­¾åˆ°
  if (daysSince === 1) return lastCheckin.streak + 1; // è¿ç»­
  return 1; // ä¸­æ–­åé‡æ–°å¼€å§‹
}

// 2. å®Œæˆç‡è®¡ç®—
function calculateCompletionRate(items: Action[]): number {
  if (items.length === 0) return 0;
  const completed = items.filter(item => item.status === "completed").length;
  return Math.round((completed / items.length) * 100);
}

// 3. å¹³è¡¡åˆ†æ•°è®¡ç®— (Covey ç‰¹å®š)
function calculateBalanceScore(roles: Role[]): number {
  if (roles.length === 0) return 0;
  
  const avg = roles.reduce((sum, r) => sum + r.score, 0) / roles.length;
  const variance = roles.reduce(
    (sum, r) => sum + Math.pow(r.score - avg, 2),
    0
  ) / roles.length;
  
  // å¹³è¡¡åˆ†æ•° = å¹³å‡åˆ† * 10 - æ–¹å·® * 2
  return Math.max(0, Math.min(100, avg * 10 - variance * 2));
}
```

```python
# åç«¯ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶æ›´æ–°çŠ¶æ€

async def write_lifecoach_state(section: str, data: Dict):
  # 1. è¯»å–ç°æœ‰æ•°æ®
  existing = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_data(user_uuid, "lifecoach")
  existing = existing or {}
  
  # 2. æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶
  if section in existing and isinstance(existing[section], dict) and isinstance(data, dict):
    # å¯¹äºå­—å…¸ï¼Œé€’å½’åˆå¹¶
    existing[section] = deep_merge(existing[section], data)
  else:
    # å¯¹äºåˆ—è¡¨æˆ–å…¶ä»–ç±»å‹ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ›¿æ¢
    existing[section] = data
  
  # 3. æ·»åŠ å…ƒæ•°æ®
  existing["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
  existing["_last_section"] = section
  
  # 4. è‡ªåŠ¨è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆå¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼‰
  if section == "goals":
    existing["focus"] = _calculate_focus(data, existing.get("current", {}))
  elif section == "goals" or section == "current":
    if "roles" in existing.get(section, {}):
      existing["balance_score"] = _calculate_balance_score(existing["goals"])
  
  # 5. ä¿å­˜
  await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_data(user_uuid, "lifecoach", existing)
  
  return {"status": "success", "message": f"å·²ä¿å­˜ {section}"}

# æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶å®ç°
def deep_merge(base: Dict, update: Dict) -> Dict:
  result = base.copy()
  for key, value in update.items():
    if key in result and isinstance(result[key], dict) and isinstance(value, dict):
      result[key] = deep_merge(result[key], value)
    elif value is not None:
      result[key] = value
  return result
```
